columns.Driver_ID: A unique identifier for each driver in the database.
columns.Name: The full name of the driver.
columns.Party: The political party affiliation of the driver.

driver.table_description: The driver table stores information about school bus drivers, including their unique identifiers, personal details, political affiliations, residence locations, and ages.

columns.School_ID: A unique identifier for each school in the dataset.
columns.Grade: The educational level or grade range that the school serves.
columns.Location: The city or geographic area where the school is located.
columns.Type: The classification of the school, such as public or private.

school.table_description: The school table contains information about various schools, including their unique identifiers, the grade levels they serve, their names, locations, and types.

columns.School_ID: This column represents the unique identifier for each school associated with the school bus system.
columns.Driver_ID: This column serves as the unique identifier for each bus driver, linking them to the corresponding school.
columns.Years_Working: This column indicates the total number of years a driver has been working in the school bus system.
columns.If_full_time: This column specifies whether the driver is employed on a full-time basis or not.

school_bus.table_description: The school_bus table is designed to link schools with their respective bus drivers, detailing the drivers' years of service and full-time employment status.
